I again made a previous bargain to be insured in the sum of two hundred pounds, hit or miss, and not to run the risk of three benefits, which, under the influence of a July sun, would have been very precarious indeed.

title: Braes o' Balquhidder. A novel

snippet: Before proceeding to the lawyer's chambers in Lincoln's Inn, Leslie left his card (containing the address of his studio at home) with the hotel clerk, and said he would be back by lunch time, should anyone call. He half expected a visit from a Haymarket dealer who had on more than one occasion bought his pictures at exhibitions. He would not, however, visit such persons, lest they should think him touting for business; even though Mr. Willis had informed him that a friend of his had been enquiring whether Mr. Leslie—who, it was said, had been summoned as a witness in the Creswick- Linnell case—was the painter of the Vennachar picture recently acquired by Mr. Graham : as, if so, he was very desirous of making his personal acquaintance.
